Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-28320 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-28320 affecting package cmake for versions less than 3.21.4-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package cmake is earlier than 3.21.4-11, affected by CVE-2023-28320
